slide1.title: Military Kitchen Planner
slide1.description: The military can create and view their daily meal schedule to ensure optimal nutrition in martial law.

slide2.title: Meal schedule
slide2.description: The military can create and view their daily meal schedule to ensure optimal nutrition in martial law.

slide3.title: Recipes and food restrictions
slide3.description: "Military Kitchen Planner" provides access to a variety of recipes, taking into account military dietary restrictions and service conditions.

slide4.title: Publishing your recipes
slide4.description: The app allows the military to create their own recipes and, if necessary, publish them to develop their culinary culture.

slide5.title: Create an account
slide5.description: "MKP" allows users to create their own account to store their preferences, recipes, and meal plans in a secure and easily accessible format.

registration.description: After filling in the data in the fields below, you will have access to all the functions of the application.

sign-in.title: Let's sign in. You have been missed!

forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a code to reset your password.

code-verification.title: Code verification
code-verification.description: Enter the code we sent to your email. If you did not receive the code, click the 'Send code again' button.

personal-info.title: Personal information
personal-info.description: Fill in the fields above. We won't share your personal information anywhere.

recipe-search.tab-title: Choose a recipe to start your meal plan

settings.tab-title: Customize your profile to your preferences

validations.email-cannot-be-longer: Email cannot be longer than {{number}} letters
validations.email-must-contain-only: Email must contain only Latin letters
validations.first-name-cannot-be-longer: First name cannot be longer than {{number}} letters
validations.first-name-can-contain-only: First name can contain only letters, single quotes, hyphens
validations.last-name-cannot-be-longer: Last name cannot be longer than {{number}} letters
validations.last-name-can-contain-only: Last name can contain only letters, single quotes, hyphens
validations.password-must-be-at-least-characters-lon: Password must be at least {{number}} characters long
validations.password-must-contain-at-least-one-speci: Password must contain at least one special symbol
validations.password-must-contain-at-least-one-numbe: Password must contain at least one number
validations.password-must-contain-only: Password must contain only Latin letters
validations.confirm-password-is-required: Confirm password is a required field
